efforts.name: Development Excellence
efforts.description: Establish professional development infrastructure and practices

tasks.title: ⭐ Establish CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Set up continuous integration and deployment. Automate testing, building, and deployment processes. Configure GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or similar.

tasks.title: Configure development environments
tasks.description: Set up dev, staging, and production environments. Ensure consistency across environments using infrastructure as code and configuration management.

tasks.title: Implement code quality tools
tasks.description: Set up linting, formatting, and code analysis tools. Enforce code quality standards automatically in CI/CD pipeline.

tasks.title: Create development documentation
tasks.description: Document architecture, APIs, and development processes. Keep docs up to date and accessible to the team.

tasks.title: Set up version control workflows
tasks.description: Establish Git workflows: branching strategies, merge policies, and code review requirements. Use feature branches and pull requests.

tasks.title: Configure development tools
tasks.description: Set up IDEs, debuggers, and development tools. Create shared configurations and extensions for consistency.

projects.name: Team Development Practices
projects.description: Establish best practices for team development

tasks.title: ⭐ Define development workflow
tasks.description: Create a clear workflow from planning to deployment. Include code review, testing, and deployment steps. Document the process.

tasks.title: Set up project structure
tasks.description: Standardize project structure and organization. Create templates and examples for new projects.

tasks.title: Establish code review process
tasks.description: Define code review requirements and process. Ensure quality, knowledge sharing, and consistent standards.

tasks.title: Implement testing strategy
tasks.description: Define testing requirements and standards. Set up test frameworks, coverage goals, and testing best practices.

tasks.title: Create coding standards
tasks.description: Document coding standards and best practices. Cover naming, structure, error handling, and documentation requirements.

tasks.title: Set up knowledge sharing
tasks.description: Establish practices for sharing knowledge: tech talks, code reviews, pair programming, and documentation.

projects.name: Advanced Agent Development
projects.description: Build sophisticated agents with best practices

tasks.title: ⭐ Design agent architecture
tasks.description: Plan agent architecture and components. Consider scalability, maintainability, and reusability. Use design patterns.

tasks.title: Implement advanced features
tasks.description: Build advanced features like error handling, logging, monitoring, retries, and circuit breakers.

tasks.title: Optimize performance
tasks.description: Profile and optimize agent performance. Improve response times, reduce resource usage, and optimize API calls.

tasks.title: Implement caching
tasks.description: Add caching strategies for frequently accessed data. Reduce API calls and improve response times.

tasks.title: Add observability
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive logging, metrics, and tracing. Enable debugging and performance monitoring.

tasks.title: Deploy and monitor
tasks.description: Deploy agents to production with proper monitoring. Set up alerts, dashboards, and incident response procedures.

efforts.name: API & Integration Development
efforts.description: Build robust API integrations and services

tasks.title: ⭐ Design API architecture
tasks.description: Design API architecture with RESTful principles or GraphQL. Plan endpoints, data models, and versioning strategy.

tasks.title: Implement API endpoints
tasks.description: Build API endpoints with proper error handling, validation, and documentation. Follow API design best practices.

tasks.title: Add API authentication
tasks.description: Implement secure authentication and authorization. Use OAuth, API keys, or JWT tokens appropriately.

tasks.title: Create API documentation
tasks.description: Write comprehensive API documentation. Use OpenAPI/Swagger and include examples, error codes, and usage guides.

tasks.title: Implement rate limiting
tasks.description: Add rate limiting to protect APIs. Prevent abuse and ensure fair resource usage.

tasks.title: Test API thoroughly
tasks.description: Write comprehensive API tests. Test endpoints, error handling, authentication, and edge cases.

projects.name: External Integrations
projects.description: Integrate with external services and APIs

tasks.title: ⭐ Design integration architecture
tasks.description: Plan integration architecture. Design data flows, error handling, and retry strategies for external services.

tasks.title: Implement API clients
tasks.description: Build robust API clients for external services. Handle authentication, rate limiting, and error recovery.

tasks.title: Add retry logic
tasks.description: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff. Handle transient failures and rate limits gracefully.

tasks.title: Set up webhook handlers
tasks.description: Implement webhook endpoints to receive real-time updates. Verify signatures and handle async processing.

tasks.title: Create integration tests
tasks.description: Write integration tests for external services. Use mocks and test doubles for reliable testing.

tasks.title: Monitor integrations
tasks.description: Set up monitoring for integrations. Track success rates, latency, and errors for external API calls.

efforts.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
efforts.description: Ensure code quality and reliability through comprehensive testing

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up test frameworks
tasks.description: Choose and configure test frameworks for unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Set up test runners and reporting.

tasks.title: Create test utilities
tasks.description: Build reusable test utilities and fixtures. Create helpers for common testing scenarios.

tasks.title: Set up test environments
tasks.description: Configure test environments that mirror production. Use containers or infrastructure as code for consistency.

tasks.title: Implement test data management
tasks.description: Create strategies for managing test data. Use factories, fixtures, and seed data for reliable tests.

tasks.title: Configure test coverage
tasks.description: Set up code coverage reporting. Set coverage thresholds and track coverage trends over time.

tasks.title: Automate test execution
tasks.description: Integrate tests into CI/CD pipeline. Run tests automatically on every commit and before deployments.

tasks.title: ⭐ Define quality standards
tasks.description: Establish quality standards for code, tests, and documentation. Define what 'done' means and quality gates.

tasks.title: Implement code analysis
tasks.description: Set up static code analysis tools. Detect bugs, security issues, and code smells automatically.

tasks.title: Create quality checklists
tasks.description: Develop checklists for code reviews. Include code quality, testing, documentation, and security checks.

tasks.title: Track quality metrics
tasks.description: Measure quality metrics: bug rates, test coverage, code review feedback. Track trends and identify improvements.

tasks.title: Conduct quality reviews
tasks.description: Regularly review code quality and processes. Identify patterns and improve practices based on findings.

tasks.title: Foster quality culture
tasks.description: Build culture that values quality. Recognize quality work and share best practices across the team.
